title: 1 bedroom / 1 bath cottage for rent in Noe Valley
posting_body: ['1 bedroom / 1 bath cottage for rent in Noe Valley (approx.', '500 sq/ft).', 'Enjoy peace and tranquility of living in a separate structure!', 'Kitchen and main area is on the first floor and bedroom on top.', 'Step out to access a beautiful (shared) backyard.', 'Interior and exterior freshly painted.', 'Updated kitchen including new countertop, brand new dishwasher and refrigerator.', 'Shared laundry on premises and included in the rent.', 'Ample street parking.', 'Very quiet and clean building in a great location.', 'This unit is centrally located with a quick walk to 24th Street BART Station, tech bus shuttles and easy freeway access.', 'Shared laundry on premises.', ' Water included in rent.', ' Tenant pays all other utilities.', '12 month lease.', 'The property is less than a three-minute walk to the brand new CPMC Mission-Bernal Campus Hospital.', "The property's location also allows one to enjoy the best shops and restaurants Noe Valley and the Mission have to offer.", 'The area has a Walk Score of 98/100, Bike Score of 97/100, and Transit Score of 82/100.', 'Good credit required; must meet income requirements; security deposit 1.5x monthly rent.', 'Virtual tour: https://youtu.be/pxwkod_dquA']
